Can you also explain the role of the Fosbury Flop technique in high jump?
Plan: 1) Search for information on the Fosbury Flop technique in high jump. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for the Fosbury Flop technique in high jump.
The Fosbury Flop is a high jump technique where the jumper clears the bar headfirst and backwards, allowing for a more efficient center of mass clearance.
